# Lab Guide {-#labs}

You will learn about the statistical programming language `R` and the software RStudio by working through 7 interactive lab tutorials and by completing lab reports. 

These tutorials and all associated materials (templates, data sets, etc) are available as an `R` package at:

[https://github.com/dundeemath/MA22004labs](https://github.com/dundeemath/MA22004labs).
